title: Pentagon Papers Whistleblower - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/18
itunes:title: Pentagon Papers Whistleblower - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/18
description:
George Noory and former Defense Department official Daniel Ellsberg discuss his role in the release of the famous Pentagon Papers in the 1970s, which detailed deception by multiple US Presidents to continue America's involvement in the Vietnam War.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
